title: User Authentication Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid email/username and password, receiving a JWT token stored in httpOnly cookies.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid email/username and password
Submit login form
Verify login response status is success (200 OK)
Verify JWT token is set in httpOnly cookie
Verify user is redirected to dashboard

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login attempt fails when invalid credentials are provided, and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid email/username or password
Submit login form
Verify login response status is 401 Unauthorized
Verify error message indicates invalid credentials

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that users can only access routes and perform actions authorized by their roles.

steps.description: Log in as a user with restricted role
Attempt to access admin-only routes and features
Verify access is denied with 403 Forbidden or proper redirect
Attempt to perform restricted actions (e.g. deleting vendors)
Verify actions are blocked and error messages shown

title: Dashboard Displays Real-Time Metrics Accurately
description: Verify the dashboard displays correct aggregated data for sales, purchases, credit status, and recent transactions in real-time.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to dashboard page
Verify sales totals match expected values from recent transactions
Verify purchases totals and statuses are correct
Verify credit status accurately reflects current customer balances
Verify recent transactions list matches recent entries in database

title: Master Data Management CRUD Operations for Fuel Products
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations on fuel product records function correctly and database updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Fuel Products management page
Create a new fuel product with valid input data
Verify new product appears in product list and database
Edit an existing fuel product to modify details
Verify updates persist in UI and database
Delete a fuel product
Verify product is removed from UI and database, and no orphan references exist

title: Form Validation on Sales Modules Using Zod Schemas
description: Ensure frontend forms for guest sales, credit sales, and other sales modules validate inputs correctly and show errors for invalid entries before submission.

steps.description: Navigate to guest sales page
Enter invalid data in required fields (e.g., empty quantity, invalid price)
Verify instant validation errors are shown and submission prevented
Enter valid data and submit sales form
Verify submission succeeds and data properly recorded

title: Credit Sales Enforce Customer Limit and Track Balances
description: Validate that credit sales cannot exceed customer credit limits and that balances update correctly after transactions.

steps.description: Select a credit customer with known credit limit and balance
Attempt to enter a credit sale exceeding the customer's remaining credit limit
Verify validation error shown and sale not accepted
Enter a credit sale within allowable limit
Verify sale accepted and customer's credit balance updated accordingly

title: Purchase Management Updates Inventory and Vendor Records
description: Confirm that purchase entries for liquid and lubricant purchases update stock levels and vendor transaction records correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to purchase entry page
Enter a new liquid fuel purchase linked to a vendor with valid data
Verify purchase saved successfully
Verify inventory stock for fuel product increased accordingly
Verify vendor transaction updated with purchase detail
Enter a lubricant purchase and validate similar updates

title: Daily Operations Modules Data Integrity and Report Update
description: Verify that daily cash reports, denomination tracking, sale rate management, recoveries, and meter readings update corresponding reports and dashboards accurately.

steps.description: Enter daily cash report data with denominations
Verify cash amounts and denominations reconciled and saved
Submit meter reading entries with valid date formats
Verify meter readings stored and reflected in daily reports
Enter a recovery payment from customer
Verify recovery recorded and customer's balance updated
Verify dashboard metrics reflect these updates

title: Financial Management Modules Track Expenses, Recoveries, and Interest
description: Validate expense entries, recovery transactions, and interest calculations are correctly processed, saved, and reflected in balances and reports.

steps.description: Navigate to expenses module and enter a new expense with valid data
Verify expense saved and expense records updated
Record an interest transaction linked to a loan and payment
Verify interest calculation is accurately computed and saved
Input a recovery payment and verify reconciliation
Verify balances and reports update accordingly

title: Stock and Inventory Reporting Accuracy
description: Ensure stock reports, opening stock, and minimum stock alert features correctly show inventory status and flag low stock.

steps.description: Navigate to stock report page and filter by date range
Verify stock levels match expected values based on latest purchase and sale transactions
Check minimum stock alert for each product
Verify alerts triggered on low stock products

title: API Rejects Invalid UUID and Malformed Requests
description: Validate that API endpoints respond with proper error codes and messages when receiving invalid UUID parameters or malformed request payloads.

steps.description: Send API request with invalid UUID parameters
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request with descriptive error
Send API request with missing required fields and malformed JSON
Verify validation errors returned and status codes are appropriate

title: Cache Invalidation Triggers UI Data Refetching
description: Test that after mutative operations (create, update, delete), TanStack Query cache invalidates and application refetches updated data to reflect on UI correctly.

steps.description: Perform a data mutation (e.g., add a new vendor)
Verify TanStack Query invalidation triggers relevant queries to refetch
Verify UI updates automatically without manual refresh showing new data

title: Password Security and JWT Token Management
description: Ensure passwords are hashed in the backend, JWT tokens are securely generated, and httpOnly cookies prevent client-side access.

steps.description: Register a new user or create a user record
Verify password stored in database is hashed and not plaintext
Perform login to obtain JWT token
Verify JWT token is set in httpOnly cookie flagged Secure and SameSite
Attempt to access JWT token via client-side scripts and verify it is inaccessible

title: Date Handling and Formatting Compliance
description: Validate all date and month input fields accept and store data in YYYY-MM-DD format, with month inputs converted to first-of-month dates correctly.

steps.description: Input a date in correct and incorrect formats in various forms (e.g., meter reading, reports filtering)
Verify only valid YYYY-MM-DD format accepted, errors returned otherwise
Input a month value and submit
Verify month is converted to first-of-month date prior to saving

title: Comprehensive Integration Test of Sales, Inventory, and Financial Flow
description: Execute an end-to-end sales transaction including sale entry, inventory update, customer credit handling, financial recording, and dashboard update to validate data integrity and flow.

steps.description: Create a new credit customer with specified credit limit
Perform a credit sale to this customer with valid data
Verify sale entry is saved, inventory decremented, customer's credit balance updated
Verify financial records reflect the sale and updated balances
Navigate to dashboard
Verify dashboard reflects updated sales and credit status

title: System Admin Operations and Logs Management
description: Verify system administrator can access configurations, view user logs, manage system settings, and that sensitive operations are logged and secured.

steps.description: Log in as system administrator
Access system configurations and attempt modification
Verify changes persist and reflect expected behavior
View user logs and verify recent actions are recorded
Verify logs contain correct timestamps, user identifiers, and action details

title: Vendor Management CRUD Operations with Data Validation
description: Confirm that vendor creation, updating, and deletion work as expected and invalid inputs are rejected with proper feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to vendor management page
Attempt to create a vendor with missing mandatory fields
Verify validation errors prevent submission
Create vendor with valid data
Verify new vendor appears in list and database
Edit vendor details
Verify updates reflect correctly
Delete vendor and confirm removal
Verify vendor record deleted without leaving orphaned purchase records
